Código fonte para tests.data_pipeline.feature_engineering.test_key_smash

import pytest

from data_pipeline.feature_engineering.key_smash import KeySmash


[documentos]class TestKeySmash:


[documentos]    def setup_method(self):
        self.key_smash = KeySmash()



[documentos]    @pytest.mark.parametrize("data, expected_output", [
        ("PUENTECILLA KM. 1.7", 1.121212121212121),
        ("ASDASD XXXX", 3.0)
    ])
    def test_char_frequency_metric(self, data, expected_output):
        assert self.key_smash.calculate_char_frequency_metric(data) == expected_output



[documentos]    @pytest.mark.parametrize("data, opt, expected_output", [
        ("PUENTECILLA KM. 1.7", "vowels", 0.21052631578947367),
        ("ASDASD XXXX", "consonants", 2.1818181818181817)
    ])
    def test_irregular_sequence_metric(self, data, opt, expected_output):
        assert self.key_smash.calculate_irregular_sequence_metric(data, opt) == expected_output



[documentos]    @pytest.mark.parametrize("data, expected_output", [
        ("ABC 123 !@#", 0.0),
        ("ABC123 !@#", 0.9)
    ])
    def test_number_count_metric(self, data, expected_output):
        assert self.key_smash.calculate_number_count_metric(data) == expected_output
